mapper.select: SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM t_article
SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT rownum AS rnum, A.* FROM (SELECT ano, title, author, viewcount FROM t_article ORDER BY ano DESC) A) B WHERE rnum between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
SELECT ano, title, content, author, createdat, updatedat, viewcount FROM t_article WHERE ano = #{ano}
UPDATE t_article SET viewcount = viewcount+1 WHERE ano = #{ano}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_article(ano, title, author, password, content) VALUES(t_article_no_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{author}, #{password}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_article SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, updatedat=sysdate WHERE ano=#{ano} AND password=#{password}
mapper.delete: DELETE t_article WHERE ano=#{ano} AND password=#{password}
